list.title: Config
list.description: A global configuration object that stores application-wide settings, loaded from config.json or defaults if not found. This object is used across the application for configuring behavior, such as Discord bot settings, MongoDB connection details, and other core features.

list.title: Discord/Commands/getmodinfo.js
list.description: Implements the /getmodinfo slash command for the Discord bot. This command retrieves detailed information about a specific mod and its version.

list.title: Discord/Commands/getmodversions.js
list.description: Implements the /getmodversions slash command for the Discord bot. This command allows users to fetch and view a list of versions for a specified mod.

list.title: Discord/Commands/getsiteactions.js
list.description: Implements the /getsiteactions slash command for the Discord bot. This command retrieves site actions.

list.title: Discord/Commands/searchmods.js
list.description: Implements the /searchmods slash command for the Discord bot. This command allows users to search for mods by name or tags and receive detailed results.

list.title: Discord/Events/ClientReady.js
list.description: Handles the "ready" event for a Discord bot client. This event is triggered when the bot successfully connects and becomes ready to interact with the Discord API. It performs necessary setup tasks, such as command registration, and logs the status for monitoring purposes.

list.title: Discord/Events/InteractionCreate.js
list.description: Handles the "interactionCreate" event in a Discord bot. This event is fired whenever a user interacts with the bot through a registered slash command or other interactions. Validates and executes the appropriate command from the global command collection.

list.title: DiscordBot.js
list.description: The main module for handling Discord bot functionality, including commands, events, and integration with the Discord API. This is the central module for all Discord-related namespaces in the application.

list.title: HandleClient
list.description: Handles operations using a MongoDB client.

list.title: Timers/LogActions.js
list.description: logs unlogged actions to the discord

list.title: Timers/UpdateMods.js
list.description: A timer to make sure ModDB data is using the latest mod version data from the ModVersions collection. This timer ensures that mod metadata in the Mods collection stays synchronized with the latest version information.

list.title: Timers/ValidateMod.js
list.description: A timer script used to automatically validate unverified mods after they have been in the database for a configurable amount of time. This implementation supports the auto-approval workflow for mods that have passed the waiting period without moderation action.

list.title: api.discordAuth.run
list.description:
Handles Discord OAuth2 authentication and callback.

  • /auth/discord: Redirects the client to Discord's OAuth2 authorization URL.
  • /auth/discord/callback: Processes the OAuth2 callback, retrieves user information, and stores it in the browser's local storage.

Query Parameters:

  • code: (required for /auth/discord/callback) The OAuth2 authorization code returned by Discord after user authentication.
    • Example: code=abcdef123456

list.title: index.js
list.description: The main entry point of the Sandustry mod site application.

list.title: module:DB
list.description: all global db functions

list.title: module:DB.ActionEntry#action
list.description: Description of the action performed.

list.title: module:DB.ActionEntry#discordID
list.description: The Discord ID of the user who performed the action.

list.title: module:DB.ActionEntry#logged
list.description: Indicates whether the action has been logged or processed.

list.title: module:DB.ActionEntry#time
list.description: The date and time when the action occurred. Defaults to the current date and time.

list.title: module:DB.GetAction
list.description: Functions related to action logging

list.title: module:DB.GetAction.Add
list.description: Adds a new action entry to the database.

list.title: module:DB.GetAction.Get
list.description: Retrieves action entries from the database based on the provided query.

list.title: module:DB.GetAction.Update
list.description:
Updates an existing action entry in the database.

This function modifies an action entry in the Actions collection, identified by its unique _id.

list.title: module:DB.GetMod
list.description: Functions related to mods.

list.title: module:DB.GetMod.Data
list.description: Functions related to Mod Data.

list.title: module:DB.GetMod.Data.One
list.description: Retrieves the data of a specific mod.

list.title: module:DB.GetMod.Data.Random
list.description: Fetches a random mod from the database.

list.title: module:DB.GetMod.Data.Search
list.description: Searches the mod db using the query provided

list.title: module:DB.GetMod.Data.Update
list.description:
Updates a mod entry in the database.

This function updates an existing mod entry in the Mods collection, identified by its unique modID.

list.title: module:DB.GetMod.Data.Upload
list.description: Uploads a mod to the db and automatically adds versions to existing mods if a mod entry exists

list.title: module:DB.GetMod.Delete
list.description:
Deletes a mod and all its associated versions from the database based on the provided mod ID.

This function removes the mod record from the Mods collection and all corresponding entries from the ModVersions collection.

list.title: module:DB.GetMod.Versions
list.description: Functions related to Mod versions.

list.title: module:DB.GetMod.Versions.All
list.description: Retrieves all versions of a mod.

list.title: module:DB.GetMod.Versions.Delete
list.description: Deletes a specific version of a mod from the database. If the mod has only one remaining version and that version is deleted, the mod itself is also removed from the Mods collection.

list.title: module:DB.GetMod.Versions.Multiple
list.description:
Retrieves the latest version of multiple mods by their IDs.

This function uses an aggregation pipeline to efficiently fetch the most recent version of each mod in the provided list of mod IDs.

list.title: module:DB.GetMod.Versions.Numbers
list.description: Retrieves a list of version numbers for a specific modID.

list.title: module:DB.GetMod.Versions.One
list.description: Retrieves the data of a specific mod version.

list.title: module:DB.GetUser
list.description: Functions related to user management in the database.

list.title: module:DB.GetUser.Add
list.description:
Adds a new user to the database or retrieves the existing user if they already exist.

If the user with the specified discordID already exists, their data is retrieved and returned. If they do not exist, a new user entry is created and added to the database.

list.title: module:DB.GetUser.Ban
list.description:
Bans a user by updating their record in the database.

This function marks a user as banned in the Users collection by setting the banned field to true.

list.title: module:DB.GetUser.One
list.description: Retrieves a single user from the database using their Discord ID.

list.title: module:DB.modEntry#votes

list.title: module:api
list.description: Global API-related functions.

list.title: module:api.admin.paths
list.description: The paths that use this module.

list.title: module:api.search
list.description: Namespace for mod search and retrieval functionality within the web module. This provides the API endpoints that power the mod browser interface.

list.title: module:api.search.paths
list.description: The paths that use this module.

list.title: module:api.search.run
list.description:
Handles API requests for mod search and retrieval.

Depending on the query parameters, the API provides different functionality:

  • Search for mods using keywords.
  • Fetch metadata of a specific mod (e.g., name, version, dependencies).
  • Download a specific version of a mod.
  • Retrieve a list of available versions for a mod.

Query Parameters:

  • search: (optional) Searches for mods using a MongoDB query provided as a JSON string. Must be a valid JSON string that is URL-encoded.

    • Example: search=%7B%22modData.name%22%3A%7B%22%24regex%22%3A%22test%22%2C%22%24options%22%3A%22i%22%7D%7D
    • This example decodes to: {"modData.name":{"$regex":"test","$options":"i"}}

  • modid: (required for non-search options) The unique ID of the mod to retrieve information or download.

    • Example: modid=1234

  • option: (required for non-search options) Specifies the action to be performed. Supported values:

    • "info": Retrieves metadata of a specific mod.
    • "download": Downloads a mod version.
    • "versions": Fetches a list of available versions for the mod.
    • Example: option=info

  • version: (optional) The specific version of a mod to retrieve or download. If not provided, the latest version will be used.

    • Example: version=1.0.0

  • page: (optional, only for search) Specifies the page of results to return for the search query. Defaults to 1.

    • Example: page=2

  • size: (optional, only for search) Specifies the number of results to return per page. Defaults to 10.

    • Example: size=25

Behavior for Query Options:

  1. search: Performs MongoDB queries on mod data using a JSON query string provided in the search parameter. Supports pagination with page and size. The search parameter should be a URL-encoded JSON string.
    • Default behavior: Returns the first 200 results (page=1, size=200).
    • Example query: /api/mods?search=%7B%22modData.name%22%3A%7B%22%24regex%22%3A%22test%22%2C%22%24options%22%3A%22i%22%7D%7D&page=2&size=20
  2. info: Retrieves metadata for a mod ID, optionally filtered by version. Requires modid, and optionally version.
  3. download: Downloads a specific version of a mod. Requires modid, and optionally version.
  4. versions: Fetches a list of all available versions for the mod ID. Requires modid.

This command retrieves information about a specific mod, including its name, description, author, version, dependencies, and more.

list.title: module:discord.Commands.searchMods.module.exports
list.description:
Slash command definition and execution logic for /searchmods.

This command searches a mod database (via MongoDB) for mods that match the given query and optionally filters by verification status. It supports paginated results up to 10 mods per page.

list.title: module:discord.computeRepoHash
list.description: Computes a hash of the repository directory. This provides a unique checksum for versioning or verifying the state of a directory.

list.title: module:discord.init
list.description: Initializes the Discord client and logs the bot in using the token retrieved from the config.

list.title: module:discord.module.exports
list.description: Objects and functions exported by the module.

list.title: module:discord.registerCommands
list.description: Registers all commands with the Discord API. This function sends the bot's command data to Discord, making it available for use in specific guilds.

list.title: module:discord.reloadCommands
list.description: Dynamically reloads command modules. This function scans the ./Discord/Commands directory and loads valid commands into the bot's global BotCommands collection.

list.title: module:discord.reloadEvents
list.description: Reloads event listeners for the bot. This function dynamically loads event files from the ./Discord/Events directory and registers them with the bot client.

list.title: module:main
list.description: Main application functions and integrations.

list.title: module:main.computeRepoHash
list.description: Computes a hash of the files within the specified directory to track changes in the repository.

list.title: module:main.defaultConfig
list.description: Default configuration for the application. This is written to config.json if no file exists.

list.title: module:main.performUpdate
list.description: Performs a git pull to update the repository, then reloads templates, pages, and Timers if changes are detected.

list.title: module:timers.LoadTimers
list.description: Function to dynamically load all timer tasks from the Timers directory and store them globally.

list.title: module:timers.LogActions
list.description: Namespace for Sandustry bot timer tasks.

list.title: module:timers.UpdateMods
list.description: Namespace for Sandustry timer tasks.

list.title: module:timers.UpdateMods.run
list.description:
Timer script to update mod metadata in the Mods collection based on the latest version data.

This function retrieves mods in batches of 50, fetches their latest version data from the ModVersions collection, and updates the main mod entries if their version information has changed. This ensures that search results and mod listings always display the most current version information.

list.title: module:timers.ValidateMod
list.description: Namespace for Sandustry timer tasks related to mod validation.

list.title: module:timers.ValidateMod.run
list.description:
Timer script that automatically validates unverified mods after they've been in the database for the configured time period.

The script queries the MongoDB database for mods marked as unverified, checks if they've exceeded the configured validationTime since their first upload, and if so, automatically marks them as verified. This creates an auto-approval workflow where mods that haven't been explicitly reviewed within the waiting period are considered safe for general use.

A log entry is created in the Actions collection whenever a mod is auto-verified.

This function generates random semantic versions of a mod, assigns metadata (such as tags and mod information), and packages each version into a .zip file. and then is uploaded to the mod and version DB as if it was uploaded

list.title: pages/admin.js

list.title: pages/admindata.js
list.description: Loads the admin api

list.title: pages/discordauth.js
list.description: Handles Discord OAuth2 authentication and callback processing for the application. Supports user redirection to the Discord authorization URL and processes the callback to retrieve user information.

list.title: pages/findmod.js
list.description: Handles APIs for searching and retrieving mod information, versions, and files. This module provides RESTful endpoints to search the mod database, download specific versions, and retrieve mod metadata. It serves as the primary interface between the frontend and the mod database.

list.title: pages/home.js
list.description: Handles the home page of the mod site. This module renders the home page.

list.title: pages/mod_version_generator.js
list.description: Generates mod version .zip files with various metadata for the modding platform. This module handles the creation of multiple versions, including tags, semantic versioning, and metadata generation. This module is for validating and testing

list.title: pages/upload.js
list.description: Handles the upload page of the mod list site. This file renders the upload page.

list.title: pages/uploadmod.js
list.description: Handles the mod upload API endpoint for mod list site. This file manages POST requests to upload a mod, validate the payload and user, and interact with the database.
